mapper.select: SELECT dus.id, dus.consignee, dus.phone, da.area_name AS province_show, daa.area_name AS city_show, daaa.area_name AS county_show, dus.site FROM djmall_user_site dus LEFT JOIN djmall_area da ON dus.province = da.id LEFT JOIN djmall_area daa ON dus.city = daa.id LEFT JOIN djmall_area daaa ON dus.county = daaa.id WHERE dus.user_id = #{userId}
